In England, in the seven days to 17 December, there were 487,492 new confirmed cases (862.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 December, there were 299,375 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 63% (188,117 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 December is 9,905,451 (17,516.2 cases per 100,000 population).
